[Desc]               <blue>Johnny Toogood is a young man, in his twenties and looks very uncomfortable to be the center of so much attention, he’s wearing a dress shirt, simple pants and has a simple cross on a chain around his neck. Why he’s on the show is a little obscure, apparently a friend was supposed to be on but they chickened out and he volunteered to appear in their place, he only found out about the fact he might be transformed a few minutes ago and looks extremely worried about it. Unfortunately no one seems to have asked him whether he really wants to do this and he’s too scared to speak out of turn. </blue>;
[LoseDesc]               <pink>Johnny is gone, replaced by Jennie Rocks, a fun loving, rule breaking, establishment shocking punk girl. Still, the near future looks like a whirl of parties, booze and sex for this fun loving girl and a reckon she’s going to enjoy every minute of it. </pink>;
